title: Huda Beauty launch new Mercury Retrograde eyeshadow palette and fans are loving it
text:

If there's one thing that is bound to send beauty fans into a frenzy, it's the launch of a new Huda Beauty product.

The makeup mogul has just released an out-of-this-world Mercury Retrograde Palette for the price of £58 - and we can't wait to try it.

Consisting of 18 galactic-inspired shades, the beautifully curated palette is a real treat for the eyes and boasts a combination of pink, copper, blue and purple hues.

The stunning jewel tones come in an array of stand-out finishes that are perfect for the Christmas party season - including velvety mattes, creamy metallics and intense glitters.

It launched with just days to go until Mercury actually does go into retrograde from October 31 to November 20.

Much like her previous palettes New Nude and Rose Gold Remastered, this new addition to Huda's ever-increasing range sold out super quick on the Cult Beauty website.

Eager makeup addicts can join either Cult Beauty or Feel Unique's waiting list to be one of the first to know when it's available to buy.

The Mercury Retrograde Palette is also available to buy at department stores including Selfridges and Harvey Nichols, so it might worth heading over to a branch to see if you can still get your hands on one.

If you're waiting to buy the palette online, be sure to keep an eye on your notifications as this dreamy product is sure to sell out again.

In the meantime, here are some of Huda Beauty's best-selling palettes that you can buy now.

Huda Beauty Rose Gold Palette Remastered, £56

This gorgeous offering is the improved version of Huda's very first palette, the Rose Gold.

With improved packaging as well as even more pigmented formulas, the Rose Gold Remastered has become an essential eyeshadow palette for die-hard makeup fans.

The striking matte and shimmery hues are incredibly buttery, blendable and simple to apply (even for a beauty novice).

Buy it now at feelunique.com

Huda Beauty Desert Dusk Palette, £56

Drawing inspiration from the colours of an Arabian desert at dusk, this luxurious palette is truly something special.

It provides four formulas to play with including eight pigmented mattes, six pressed pearls and three duo-chrome toppers that look stunning when they catch the light.

Once you try it, you'll be as addicted as us.

Buy it now at cultbeauty.co.uk

Huda Beauty The New Nude Eyeshadow Palette, £56

Just when we thought we didn't need another Huda Beauty palette, the bonafide beauty mogul treated fans to a dreamy case of must-have neutral and cool shades.

We instantly fell in love with the ultra creamy mattes, easy to apply glitters and multi-reflective shades with shimmering pearl flecks.

The best part? Each of the formulas lend themselves to incredibly easy application - which makes getting dolled up in a rush simpler than ever.

Buy it now at feelunique.com
